EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-06-07 Cisco Live! Invite.ES-2018-06-07 Cisco Live! Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: We hope to see you soon at Cisco Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Will you be joining us at Cisco Live! 2018 next week? We hope you will stop by and visit us at booth #1243. We would love to have the opportunity to connect with you in person.
There will be plenty of chances to see a demo of our latest technology, speak with our executive team and enter to win a Sonos One speaker or Amazon gift card!
If you’d like to schedule a separate, one on one meeting with a member of our executive team outside of the booth, please reach out to events@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:events@turbonomic.com]]>.
See you next week in Orlando!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
